{{Wireless embedded system |brand=3Com |model=3CRWDR101B-75 |revision=(WL-552) |asin= |manuf_country=China |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=AR4505NW |availability= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/11/2006 |fcc_id=RAXAR4505NW |pcb_id=141450520014J |type=wireless router,dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETD7300A |cpu1_cspeed=160 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F160C3-B |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=PSC |ram1_model=A2V28S40BTP |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Arcadyan WN4403A |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1350A |wi1_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip2_model=TNETW3422 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=3Com |default_ssid_regex=^3Com$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:14:7C |oui_eth=00:14:7C }} {{TagLine|3Com OfficeConnect ADSL Wireless 54Mbps 11g Firewall Router}}
"P/N: 141450520014J REV: 0B" is silkscreened on the board. :Default settings are per the FCC manual.
*[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/3com-wl-552-3com-officeconnect-adsl-wireless-54-1260 On SpeedGuide.net]
